description: This file defines the 'EmptyState' widget for a Flutter app, which displays a centered message with an icon, title, subtitle, and optional action button.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a centered message with optional action, used to indicate an empty or placeholder state.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Constructor for the EmptyState widget, allowing customization of icon, title, subtitle, and optional action.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that constructs the widget tree for displaying the empty state message.
